title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs with most of the cheese and season generously with pepper.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta and egg-cheese mixture off the heat to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with remaining cheese on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple and healthy avocado on toasted bread with a sprinkle of chili flakes.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and chili flakes to taste
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Spread on toast and sprinkle chili flakes.
